name: 3netr4g
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, c3))
-| wb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, c3))
-| wb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

comment: Substitution of equality into both sides of an inequality. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2012.)
